abstract: Queens Dist Atty Richard A Brown will set up Office of Immigrant Affairs to help immigrants navigate criminal justice system and aid in prosecution of immigrant-related crime; Brown is third district attorney in New York City to open immigrant-specific unit.
lead_paragraph: The Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, said the office will enhance efforts to prosecute cases of immigrant-related crimes such as financial exploitation.
snippet: The Queens district attorney, Richard A. Brown, said the office will enhance efforts to prosecute cases of immigrant-related crimes such as financial exploitation.

headline.main: Queens Prosecutor Creates Office of Immigrant Affairs
headline.print_headline: Queens Prosecutor Creates Immigrant Affairs Office
